name: Axiom Station
description: A massive orbital research facility stationed at the edge of the Orion Sector. Known for cutting-edge xenobiology and physics research, the station has recently gone into lockdown after an apparent security breach.

connectedLocations.description: The main docking area for transport shuttles, currently locked down with only emergency access available.
A network of maintenance tunnels that run throughout the station, accessible only to authorized personnel.

parentLocation.description: Axiom Station orbits a gas giant in the Orion Sector, a contested region between human and Xenovek territories.

subLocations.description: The nerve center of the station, where Commander Voss coordinates security and research operations.
The primary research laboratory, containing sensitive equipment and the station's quantum data cores.

pointsOfInterest.name: Damaged Security Door
pointsOfInterest.description: A security door showing signs of forced entry, with burn marks suggesting advanced energy weapons.

pointsOfInterest.name: Holographic Star Map
pointsOfInterest.description: A detailed 3D projection of the Orion Sector, with several systems marked as classified research locations.

historyLog.description: The player's transport ship docked at Axiom Station and they proceeded through standard security protocols.
Commander Voss activated station-wide lockdown protocols after discovering a breach in the research lab.

notes: Axiom Station houses classified research on Xenovek technology and potential weaknesses. The station AI, IRIS, has been exhibiting unusual behavior patterns recently.
